commit.message:
Add new SVG icon components: info-circle, profile, and search

- Created `info-circle-IPnV1waG.js` for the info-circle icon with customizable properties.
- Created `profile-BXyl_00R.js` for the profile icon, supporting color, size, title, and className props.
- Created `search-CsUTBgux.js` for the search icon, also allowing customization of color, size, title, and className.

Add new SVG icon components for info-circle, profile, and search

- Implemented `info-circle` icon with customizable properties.
- Added `profile` icon with various attributes for color, size, and title.
- Created `search` icon component, also supporting customization.
- All components utilize React and PropTypes for type checking.
chore: add package overrides for cookie and tmp dependencies

Add new SVG components and update existing assets

- Introduced new SVG components for info-circle, profile, and search functionalities.
- Enhanced the profile component with additional props for better customization.
- Implemented forwardRef for SVG components to allow ref forwarding.
- Updated asset files to include necessary imports and prop types for better type checking.

Bump js-yaml from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 (#16)

Bumps [js-yaml](https://github.com/nodeca/js-yaml) from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1.
- [Changelog](https://github.com/nodeca/js-yaml/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/nodeca/js-yaml/compare/4.1.0...4.1.1)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: js-yaml
  dependency-version: 4.1.1
  dependency-type: indirect
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>
Co-authored-by: dependabot[bot] <49699333+dependabot[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>

Add new SVG components and assets for ReactSpark application

- Introduced `index-DetDEU9z.js` for main application logic.
- Added `info-circle-DO9tuuYf.js` component for info circle icon.
- Implemented `profile-D7LpDnzG.js` component for profile icon with extensive features.
- Created `search-DuY7ttz6.js` component for search icon functionality.
- Enhanced the overall structure and organization of SVG assets.
Refactor code structure for improved readability and maintainability; removed redundant code blocks and optimized function calls.

Bump vite from 7.1.9 to 7.1.11

Bumps [vite](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/tree/HEAD/packages/vite) from 7.1.9 to 7.1.11.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/blob/main/packages/vite/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/commits/v7.1.11/packages/vite)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: vite
  dependency-version: 7.1.11
  dependency-type: direct:development
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

feat: Implement cache busting and version management system

- Enhanced Vite build configuration to include file hashing for cache busting.
- Added a new documentation file detailing the cache busting and version management features.
- Created `UpdateNotification` component for user notifications about available updates.
- Developed `useVersionCheck` hook to manage version checking and updates.
- Introduced image utility functions for cache busting and optimization.
- Implemented a version management utility to handle versioning and update checks.
feat: Transform project image URLs to absolute paths and enhance validation in ProjectService

feat: Add proxy services for jokes and projects, including error handling and caching

- Implemented Azure Functions to proxy requests for jokes and projects.
- Added CORS support and error handling in proxy functions.
- Integrated Axios for API requests with timeouts and fallback data.
- Enhanced Vite configuration to include SCSS preprocessor options and asset handling for font files.
- Created a custom FontAwesome CSS file to resolve build-time warnings.
- Developed JokeService and ProjectService for fetching data with caching mechanisms.
- Included detailed logging for request and response handling in proxies.

Add new SVG components for info-circle, profile, and search icons

- Implemented `info-circle` icon component with customizable properties.
- Created `profile` icon component featuring multiple paths and props.
- Developed `search` icon component with adjustable size and color.
- All components utilize React's forwardRef and prop-types for better integration and type checking.
